articles.description: Skinamarink may be the first movie that was willed by internet culture into a horror phenomenon.
articles.content:
The plan in place was a distribution deal with IFC Midnight and the horror streaming service Shudder, both of which had to move quickly after the leak gained traction.
Im not happy that it got leake… [+2272 chars]
